020
021import com.google.common.io.ByteArrayDataOutput;
022import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
023
024import java.io.DataInputStream;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.List;
028
029/**
030 * ConfigEntry
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.1.2.0
034 */
035public class ConfigEntry {
036
037  private final List<String> synced = new ArrayList<>();
038
039  private final List<String> configs = new ArrayList<>();
040  private final List<String> currencies = new ArrayList<>();
041
042  private byte[] bytes;
043
044
045  private final String pin;
046
047  public ConfigEntry(final String pin) {
048
049    this.pin = pin;
050  }
051
052  public List<String> getConfigs() {
053
054    return configs;
055  }
056
057  public List<String> getCurrencies() {
058
059    return currencies;
060  }
061
062  public List<String> getSynced() {
063
064    return synced;
065  }
066
067  public String getPin() {
068
069    return pin;
070  }
071
072  public byte[] getBytes() {
073
074    return bytes;
075  }
076
077  private void genBytes() {
078
079    final ByteArrayDataOutput out = ByteStreams.newDataOutput();
080    out.writeUTF(pin);
081
082    out.writeShort(currencies.size());
083    for(final String str : currencies) {
084      out.writeUTF(str);
085    }
086
087    for(final String str : configs) {
088      out.writeUTF(str);
089    }
090    bytes = out.toByteArray();
091  }
092
093  public static ConfigEntry fromBytes(final DataInputStream stream) {
094
095    //hub string
096    //currency size short
097    //currencies string
098    //configs
099    try {
100      final String hub = stream.readUTF();
101
102      final ConfigEntry entry = new ConfigEntry(hub);
103
104      final short currencies = stream.readShort();
105      for(int i = 0; i < currencies; i++) {
106        entry.getCurrencies().add(stream.readUTF());
107      }
108
109      entry.getConfigs().add(stream.readUTF());
110      entry.getConfigs().add(stream.readUTF());
111
112      entry.genBytes();
113
114      return entry;
115
116    } catch(IOException e) {
117      e.printStackTrace();
118    }
119    return null;
120  }
121}
